channel.title: New animations for the HECU marines?
channel.description:
is there going to be New animations for the HECU marines simply because they using combine animations, it would be nice if you could use the old animations from the old half life Come on some of these animations got to be in the BMS source the only thing that is lacking is the grunts animations
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EuStSNvZxfM[/url] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=endscreen&v=YMX1-kqZLCQ&NR=1[/url] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ynt0JlEP4PI&feature=related[/url]
